QuestData.Title: Death From Below
QuestData.Description: This is bad. It seems the Daggerspines are amassing for an attack.$b$bNaga are known for their ruthlessness in battle. They will keep attacking until I am dead.$b$bI don't value my own life above that of my crew members, but you must help to defend me. The crew will not be able to make it back to Booty Bay without my knowledge of the seas.$b$bThe naga will be coming from the sea. I need you to remain up here with me to fend off the attack. Man the cannon and drive them back.$b$bAre you ready, $n?
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect Shakes O'Breen during the attack.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Shakes O'Breen at Faldir's Cove in Arathi Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: We survived the attack!$b$bWe could not have done it without you, $n.$b$bWe'll be heading out as soon as the tide rises. If you weren't such a promising hero I'd offer you a place on my crew. But I can tell you have bigger fish to fry.$b$bEven if you are a puny $r....
